name: Circle Beat
description:
*NOTE*
sadly the soundbars are not working with UntiyGL. I tried fixing it but that just made it worst. If you're interested here is how the game looks with soundbars: 

Roll the ball in the holes by clicking on your screen.
Change the direction of the ball and collect the notes laying round in the field,
but don't be too greedy otherwise, you might be too late to get to the hole.

With the notes you'll be able to purchase awesome accessories from the in-game shop!
- Ball Color
- Trial Color

Be careful to not be too greedy or the rings will get you.
